project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts word frequency, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to read the text file and process its content
Implement the logic to count the frequency of each word
Implement the functionality to determine the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the file reading, word counting, and top 10 extraction functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
